data.message: Why do I have to keep force quitting your app to get it to update notifications, regardless of whether I'm using wifi or data?

replies.message: Hi Dyson. It sounds like you may have a bug. Learn how to report it here: http://bit.ly/2iAYAMx. -Tenaya

Facebook I have reported broken feature for 2 months. All I get is Our reply
Nov 19
Your feedback will be used to improve Facebook. Thanks for taking the time to make a report.
I am not submitting feedback. I am reporting a broken feature.
Hi Robert. You can learn how to report a broken feature in the Help Center: http://bit.ly/2AiGczz. -Tenaya

Facebook Come on, this is the issue, I followed those steps. Thanks for reporting: People are saying they have liked the page and liked a post and it is not showing up.  and I get Our reply
Oct 12
Your feedback will be used to improve Facebook. Thanks for taking the time to make a report.
See same Joke! I report bug, you say thanks for feedback. I want real person to tell me issues please.
